pages.text: $(li)The Illager General will not attack the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) or you directly.$(br)$(li)It will places down support columns that allows him to spawn $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l) and its able to call for reinforcements while it is inside of the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_fort)Illager Fort$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be found in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l) or in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_fort)Illager Fort$(/l).
Don't even think about slaying the $(l)Illager General$() or you will start a war against the Illagers.
